chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
n: nat
m: nat
r2: pos_map m n
r1: pos_map m n

Goal:
pm_ext_eq r1 r2 -> pm_ext_eq (pm_lift r1) (pm_lift r2)

Premises:
pos_map = fun m n : nat => pos m -> pos n : nat -> nat -> Set Arguments pos_map (_ _)%nat_scope
pm_lift : forall m n : nat, pos_map m n -> pos_map (S m) (S n)
pm_ext_eq : forall m n : nat, pos_map m n -> pos_map m n -> Prop
VectorDef.fold_left2 : (?A -> ?B -> ?C -> ?A) -> ?A -> forall n0 : nat, VectorDef.t ?B n0 -> VectorDef.t ?C n0 -> ?A where ?A : [m : nat n : nat r1 : pos_map m n r2 : pos_map m n |- Type] ?B : [m : nat n : nat r1 : pos_map m n r2 : pos_map m n |- Type] ?C : [m : nat n : nat r1 : pos_map m n r2 : pos_map m n |- Type]
VectorDef.nth_order : VectorDef.t ?A ?n -> forall p : nat, p < ?n -> ?A where ?A : [m : nat n : nat r1 : pos_map m n r2 : pos_map m n |- Type] ?n : [m : nat n : nat r1 : pos_map m n r2 : pos_map m n |- nat]
VectorDef.take : forall p : nat, p <= ?n -> VectorDef.t ?A ?n -> VectorDef.t ?A p where ?A : [m : nat n : nat r1 : pos_map m n r2 : pos_map m n |- Type] ?n : [m : nat n : nat r1 : pos_map m n r2 : pos_map m n |- nat]
VectorDef.trunc : forall p : nat, ?n > p -> VectorDef.t ?A ?n -> VectorDef.t ?A (?n - p) where ?A : [m : nat n : nat r1 : pos_map m n r2 : pos_map m n |- Type] ?n : [m : nat n : nat r1 : pos_map m n r2 : pos_map m n |- nat]
Fin.of_nat_ext : forall h h' : ?p < ?n, Fin.of_nat_lt h = Fin.of_nat_lt h' where ?p : [m : nat n : nat r1 : pos_map m n r2 : pos_map m n |- nat] ?n : [m : nat n : nat r1 : pos_map m n r2 : pos_map m n |- nat]
VectorSpec.eta : forall v : VectorDef.t ?A (S ?n), v = VectorDef.cons ?A (VectorDef.hd v) ?n (VectorDef.tl v) where ?A : [m : nat n : nat r1 : pos_map m n r2 : pos_map m n |- Type] ?n : [m : nat n : nat r1 : pos_map m n r2 : pos_map m n |- nat]
Fin.cast : pos ?m -> forall n0 : nat, ?m = n0 -> pos n0 where ?m : [m : nat n : nat r1 : pos_map m n r2 : pos_map m n |- nat]
VectorDef.caseS' : forall (v : VectorDef.t ?A (S ?n)) (P : VectorDef.t ?A (S ?n) -> Type), (forall (h : ?A) (t : VectorDef.t ?A ?n), P (VectorDef.cons ?A h ?n t)) -> P v where ?A : [m : nat n : nat r1 : pos_map m n r2 : pos_map m n |- Type] ?n : [m : nat n : nat r1 : pos_map m n r2 : pos_map m n |- nat]
VectorDef.case0 : forall P : VectorDef.t ?A 0 -> Type, P (VectorDef.nil ?A) -> forall v : VectorDef.t ?A 0, P v where ?A : [m : nat n : nat r1 : pos_map m n r2 : pos_map m n |- Type]
Fin.caseS' : forall (p : pos (S ?n)) (P : pos (S ?n) -> Type), P pos0 -> (forall p0 : pos ?n, P (pos_nxt p0)) -> P p where ?n : [m : nat n : nat r1 : pos_map m n r2 : pos_map m n |- nat]
VectorDef.Exists_cons_hd : forall (P : ?A -> Prop) (m0 : nat) (x : ?A) (v : VectorDef.t ?A m0), P x -> VectorDef.Exists P (VectorDef.cons ?A x m0 v) where ?A : [m : nat n : nat r1 : pos_map m n r2 : pos_map m n |- Type]
VectorDef.Forall_cons : forall (P : ?A -> Prop) (n0 : nat) (x : ?A) (v : VectorDef.t ?A n0), P x -> VectorDef.Forall P v -> VectorDef.Forall P (VectorDef.cons ?A x n0 v) where ?A : [m : nat n : nat r1 : pos_map m n r2 : pos_map m n |- Type]
VectorDef.Exists_cons_tl : forall (P : ?A -> Prop) (m0 : nat) (x : ?A) (v : VectorDef.t ?A m0), VectorDef.Exists P v -> VectorDef.Exists P (VectorDef.cons ?A x m0 v) where ?A : [m : nat n : nat r1 : pos_map m n r2 : pos_map m n |- Type]
VectorDef.In_cons_tl : forall (a : ?A) (m0 : nat) (x : ?A) (v : VectorDef.t ?A m0), VectorDef.In a v -> VectorDef.In a (VectorDef.cons ?A x m0 v) where ?A : [m : nat n : nat r1 : pos_map m n r2 : pos_map m n |- Type]
VectorDef.In_cons_hd : forall (a : ?A) (m0 : nat) (v : VectorDef.t ?A m0), VectorDef.In a (VectorDef.cons ?A a m0 v) where ?A : [m : nat n : nat r1 : pos_map m n r2 : pos_map m n |- Type]
pos_S_inv : forall p : pos (S ?n), (p = pos0) + {q : pos ?n | p = pos_nxt q} where ?n : [m : nat n : nat r1 : pos_map m n r2 : pos_map m n |- nat]
VectorDef.caseS : forall P : forall n0 : nat, VectorDef.t ?A (S n0) -> Type, (forall (h : ?A) (n0 : nat) (t : VectorDef.t ?A n0), P n0 (VectorDef.cons ?A h n0 t)) -> forall (n0 : nat) (v : VectorDef.t ?A (S n0)), P n0 v where ?A : [m : nat n : nat r1 : pos_map m n r2 : pos_map m n |- Type]
VectorDef.rectS : forall P : forall n0 : nat, VectorDef.t ?A (S n0) -> Type, (forall a : ?A, P 0 (VectorDef.cons ?A a 0 (VectorDef.nil ?A))) -> (forall (a : ?A) (n0 : nat) (v : VectorDef.t ?A (S n0)), P n0 v -> P (S n0) (VectorDef.cons ?A a (S n0) v)) -> forall (n0 : nat) (v : VectorDef.t ?A (S n0)), P n0 v where ?A : [m : nat n : nat r1 : pos_map m n r2 : pos_map m n |- Type]
gt = fun n m : nat => m < n : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments gt (_ _)%nat_scope
lt = fun n m : nat => S n <= m : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments lt (_ _)%nat_scope
pm_lift_fst : forall (m n : nat) (r : pos_map m n), pm_lift r pos0 = pos0
le_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : nat -> Prop), P n -> (forall m : nat, n <= m -> P m -> P (S m)) -> forall n0 : nat, n <= n0 -> P n0
Nat.ls'_ls'' : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall z : nat, (forall n : nat, n <= z -> (forall m : nat, m <= z -> S n <= m -> A m) -> A n) -> forall n : nat, (forall m : nat, m <= z -> n <= m -> A m) < -> (forall m : nat, m <= z -> S n <= m -> A m)
Init.Nat.mul = fix mul (n m : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => 0 | S p => m + mul p m end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.mul (_ _)%nat_scope
Init.Nat.tail_add = fix tail_add (n m : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => m | S n0 => tail_add n0 (S m) end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.tail_add (_ _)%nat_scope

```coq
intros H.
unfold pm_lift.
induction r1; induction r2.
- constructor.
- simpl.
  rewrite IHr1.
  constructor.
Qed.
```

original: intros H. unfold pm_lift. induction r1; induction r2. - constructor. - simpl. rewrite IHr1. constructor.
